opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Turner v. Barnes, Judge, United States District Court for the Western District of Arkansas

opinion:
538 U.S. 997

TURNER
v.
BARNES, JUDGE, UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF ARKANSAS.

No. 02-9563.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 28, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE EIGHTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 8th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8.
